div.a: 4/24/2020 Graduation All Call from Mr. Moldovan
div.span: Good evening, this is Mike Moldovan, principal at Canfield High School. I hope that you and your families are safe and healthy. We got word from the Ohio Department of Education yesterday about Graduation ceremonies in Ohio for the class of 2020...
